title: What is your opinion of Lil Baby? - Quora

response.answer_text: He has songs like “pure cocaine” and “cash”you tell me lol..I never said I can't listen to an artist music before , however, I can't listen to him, I would rather listen to lil pump.when he got dissed by em he admitted he deserved it for destroying rap music . I respect that..lil baby running around like he is the best and his fans agree, Lmao. top 5 mumble rapper for sure. Mumble mumble mumble mumble cash cash cash mumble mumble! Lol I hope eminem disses him next.
